trans-unit.source: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar button.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en liste med elementer og oppgaver vises som en meny på en [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] på oppgavelinjen.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] oppgavelinjen gir forbedret funksjonalitet for å starte programmer direkte fra knappen på oppgavelinjen ved hjelp av hoppe lister.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu.
trans-unit.target: Hopplister brukes også i den [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] Start-menyen.

trans-unit.source: You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til en hoppe liste ved å høyreklikke en på oppgavelinjen, eller ved å velge retningspilen ved siden av et program på Start-menyen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hoppe i det [oppgavelinjen](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) delen av den Windows samhandling veiledning for brukeropplevelse.

trans-unit.source: The JumpList class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Klassen JumpList inneholder en forvaltet wrapper for hoppe liste-funksjonalitet i den [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] oppgavelinjen og behandler data som er sendt til den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: The functionality exposed by the JumpList class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Funksjonaliteten som vises av klassen JumpList er ikke tilgjengelig i versjoner av [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] tidligere enn [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Applications that use the JumpList class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available.
trans-unit.target: Programmer som bruker klassen JumpList kjøres i andre versjoner av [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], men listen hoppe er ikke tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om Windows-grensesnitt og opprinnelige hoppe listen APIer [oppgavelinjen utvidelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser hoppe listen for Windows Media Player, med elementer i den **oppgaver** og **Frequent** kategorier.

trans-unit.source: ![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List") Windows Media Player Jump List ## Configuring a Jump List Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: ![Windows Media Player hoppe listen](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player hoppe listen") Windows Media Player hoppe listen ## konfigurere en hoppe liste hoppe lister kan inneholde to typer elementer, et <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>er en kobling til et annet program, og en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>er en kobling til en fil.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skille elementer i en liste som hopper visuelt ved å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>som ikke har en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>angitte.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: This empty <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Denne tom <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>vises som en vannrett linje i listen hoppe.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the type of the file specified in a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis filtypen som er angitt i en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>er ikke registrert med programmet ditt filen vises ikke i listen hoppe.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du legger til en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>som peker til en TXT-fil, må være registrert programmet til å behandle TXT-filer.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [innføring i filen tilknytninger](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).

trans-unit.source: Jump items are placed into categories in the JumpList.
trans-unit.target: Hopp elementer plasseres i kategorier i JumpList.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> is displayed in the **Tasks** category.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>vises i den **oppgaver** kategori.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the JumpList by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om standard **nye** og **Frequent** kategoriene i JumpList ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i disse kategoriene administreres av den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your JumpList, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Fordi disse kategoriene kan inneholde mye av de samme dataene, vise du vanligvis én i din JumpList, men ikke begge deler.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]administrerer postelementer automatisk hvis de åpnes via en vanlig dialogboks eller brukes til å åpne en applikasjon i filen typen association.

trans-unit.source: When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når et element i listen hoppe, kan du varsle i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnittet for å legge til elementet som det **nye** kategori ved å ringe det <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applying a Jump List to the Windows Shell You cannot access the shell’s Jump List directly or read its contents into the JumpList class.
trans-unit.target: Bruker en liste med hoppe i Windows-grensesnittet du kan ikke få direkte tilgang til i grensesnittet hoppe listen eller lese innholdet i JumpList-klassen.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the JumpList class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: I stedet klassen JumpList gir en representasjon av en hoppe liste som du kan arbeide med, og deretter bruke den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: You typically create a JumpList and set it one time when the application is first run.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis lager en JumpList og det når programmet først kjøres én gang.

trans-unit.source: However, you can modify or replace the JumpList at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid endre eller erstatte JumpList på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: When you have set the JumpList properties, you must apply the JumpList to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt egenskapene JumpList, må du bruke JumpList til Windows-grensesnittet før innholdet vises på oppgavelinjen hoppe listen.

trans-unit.source: This is done automatically when the JumpList is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres automatisk når JumpList først er knyttet til en applikasjon i XAML eller i et kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you modify the contents of the JumpList at run time, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer innholdet i JumpList ved kjøretid, må du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>metode for å bruke gjeldende innhold i Windows-grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting a Jump List in XAML A JumpList is not automatically attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Angi en liste med hoppe i XAML A JumpList ikke automatisk er koblet til en <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: You attach a JumpList to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in XAML by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: Du knytter JumpList til en <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet i XAML ved å bruke egenskapssyntaksen tilknyttede.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The JumpList class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a JumpList.
trans-unit.target: JumpList klassen implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>grensesnittet for å støtte XAML deklarasjon av en JumpList.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: If the JumpList is declared in XAML and attached to the current <xref:System.Windows.Application>, it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the JumpList is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Hvis JumpList er deklarert i XAML og knyttet til gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Application>, brukes automatisk til den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnitt når JumpList initialiseres.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code You attach a JumpList to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in code by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Angi og endre en hoppe liste med koden du knytte JumpList til en <xref:System.Windows.Application>objekt i koden ved å kalle statiske <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This also applies the JumpList to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjelder også JumpList til den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: To modify a JumpList at run time, you call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A> method to get the JumpList that is currently attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre en JumpList ved kjøretid, kaller du <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A>metode for å hente JumpList som er tilknyttet en <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have modified the properties of the JumpList, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply the changes to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Når du har endret egenskapene for JumpList, må du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>metode for å bruke endringene i Windows-grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You typically create one JumpList that is attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Application> and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Vanligvis oppretter du en JumpList som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Windows.Application>og brukt på den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnitt.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create multiple JumpList objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid opprette flere JumpList-objekter.

trans-unit.source: Only one JumpList at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one JumpList at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Bare én JumpList om gangen kan brukes på den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] grensesnittet, og bare én JumpList om gangen kan knyttes til en <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same JumpList.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework krever ikke at dette er den samme JumpList.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne klassen inneholder en kobling behov på klassen nivået som gjelder for alle medlemmer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes når umiddelbar oppkalleren ikke har tillatelse for fullstendig klarering.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om krav for sikkerhet, se [koblingen krav](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [arv krav](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> klassen med de angitte parameterne.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: Den **nye** og **Frequent** kategorier inneholder ofte mange av de samme Hopp-elementene.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet programmer vanligvis viser enten den **nye** eller **Frequent** kategori i listen hoppe, men ikke begge deler.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objekter som vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om de mest brukte elementer vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om nylig brukte elementer vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte elementet banen til den **nye** kategorien av hoppe-listen.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i den **nye** kategori administreres av Windows-grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise nylig brukte elementer i listen hoppe, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kalle metoden AddToRecentCategory for å be om at Windows-grensesnittet legger til en bane til den **nye** liste over.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to AddToRecentCategory will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet ikke er registrert til å behandle filtypen for elementet, ikke vises i den **nye** liste- og kall til AddToRecentCategory mislykkes stille.

trans-unit.source: The path to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Banen til å legge til i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified jump path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte Hopp banen til den **nye** kategorien av hoppe-listen.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i den **nye** kategori administreres av Windows-grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise nylig brukte elementer i listen hoppe, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kalle metoden AddToRecentCategory for å be om at Windows-grensesnittet legge til den angitte Hopp banen til den **nye** liste over.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to AddToRecentCategory will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet ikke er registrert til å behandle filtypen for elementet, ikke vises i den **nye** liste- og kall til AddToRecentCategory mislykkes stille.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"></xref> to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"> </xref> å legge til i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified jump task to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Legger til oppgaven angitte Hopp til den **nye** kategorien av hoppe-listen.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i den **nye** kategori administreres av Windows-grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise nylig brukte elementer i listen hoppe, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump task to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kalle metoden AddToRecentCategory for å be om at Windows-grensesnittet legge til angitte Hopp aktiviteten i den **nye** liste over.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"></xref> to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"> </xref> å legge til i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: Sender den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> til Windows-grensesnitt i den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The Apply method sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Bruk sender innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>til Windows-grensesnitt i den gjeldende tilstanden.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Når dette kallet er fullført, den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>egenskapen er endret til å inneholde bare elementene i Windows-grensesnittet lagt til oppgavelinjen hoppe listen.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til listen over fjernes elementene via hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> is not completely initialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> er ikke fullstendig initialisert.

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Signaliserer til starten av den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> initialisering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>Klassen implementerer <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>grensesnittet for å støtte XAML deklarasjon av <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The BeginInit method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginInit bare kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>er deklarert i XAML og knyttet til en <xref:System.Windows.Application>ved å bruke egenskapssyntaksen tilknyttede.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kall ikke fra koden.

trans-unit.source: This call to BeginInit is nested in a previous call to BeginInit.
trans-unit.target: Dette kallet til BeginInit er nestet i en tidligere kall til BeginInit.

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Signaliserer til slutten av den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> initialisering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>Klassen implementerer <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>grensesnittet for å støtte XAML deklarasjon av <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The EndInit method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndInit bare kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>er deklarert i XAML og knyttet til en <xref:System.Windows.Application>ved å bruke egenskapssyntaksen tilknyttede.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kall ikke fra koden.

trans-unit.source: The EndInit method has the same effect as the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndInit fungerer på samme måte som den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: EndInit sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: EndInit sender innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>til Windows-grensesnitt i den gjeldende tilstanden.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Når dette kallet er fullført, den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>egenskapen er endret til å inneholde bare elementene i Windows-grensesnittet lagt til i listen hoppe.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til listen over fjernes elementene via hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: This call to EndInit is not paired with a call to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>.
trans-unit.target: Dette kallet til EndInit forbundet ikke med et kall til <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> tilknyttet en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: You can call the GetJumpList method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kalle metoden GetJumpList for å få <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>tilordnet en <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that this be the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> that is currently applied to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework krever ikke at dette er den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>som brukes i Windows-grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The application associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Program som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with the specified application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til den angitte applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objekter som vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: Hopplister kan inneholde to typer elementer, et <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>er en kobling til et annet program, og en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>er en kobling til en fil.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is created, the JumpItems collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>er opprettet av JumpItems-samlingen er tom.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can add any <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til alle <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>eller <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>objekter i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen kan bare inneholde elementene som har blitt lagt til av programmet ditt.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> methods, the JumpItems collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Etter den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>ble sendt til Windows-grensesnittet av en vellykket kall til enten den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>metoder, JumpItems-samlingen inneholder bare elementene som ble lagt til oppgavelinjen hoppe listen.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: Items that were not successfully added are removed from the JumpItems collection.
trans-unit.target: Elementer som ikke ble lagt fjernes fra samlingen JumpItems.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til listen over fjernes elementene via hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objekter som vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items are not successfully added to the Jump List by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når Hopp elementer ikke er lagt til listen hoppe av Windows-grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Etter at innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>brukes på Windows-grensesnitt den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>egenskapen er endret til å inneholde bare elementene i Windows-grensesnittet lagt til i listen hoppe.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the JumpItemsRejected and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til listen over fjernes elementene via hendelsesbehandling for JumpItemsRejected og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items previously in the Jump List are removed from the list by the user.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når Hopp tidligere i listen hoppe fjernes fra listen av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Etter at innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>brukes på Windows-grensesnitt den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>egenskapen er endret til å inneholde bare elementene i Windows-grensesnittet lagt til i listen hoppe.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and JumpItemsRemovedByUser events.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til listen over fjernes elementene via hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>og JumpItemsRemovedByUser hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> tilknyttet en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: You can create multiple <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette flere <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: However, only one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid bare én <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>om gangen kan tilknyttes en <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: Call the SetJumpList method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Kall metoden SetJumpList for å angi <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>som er tilknyttet en <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The application associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Program som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> to associate with the application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> å knytte til programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om de mest brukte elementer vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i den **Frequent** kategori administreres av Windows-grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the ShowFrequentCategory property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å vise de mest brukte elementene i listen hoppe, angi ShowFrequentCategory egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: Den **nye** og **Frequent** kategorier inneholder ofte mange av de samme Hopp-elementene.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet programmer vanligvis viser enten den **nye** eller **Frequent** kategori i listen hoppe, men ikke begge deler.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis de mest brukte elementene vises i listen hoppe; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om nylig brukte elementer vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i den **nye** kategori administreres av Windows-grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the ShowRecentCategory property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å vise de mest brukte elementene i listen hoppe, angi ShowRecentCategory egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: Den **nye** og **Frequent** kategorier inneholder ofte mange av de samme Hopp-elementene.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet programmer vanligvis viser enten den **nye** eller **Frequent** kategori i listen hoppe, men ikke begge deler.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe det <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>metode for å be om at Windows-grensesnittet legge til elementer i **nye** listen over elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet ikke er registrert til å behandle filtypen for navnet på selve elementet, ikke vises i den **nye** liste- og kall til <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>mislykkes stille.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if recently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du nylig har brukt blir vist i hoppe-listen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
